name: Colonel Brandon Worsted - Spring Green
description:
Colonel Brandon is a yarn just as soulful as the character in Sense & Sensibility! Steadfast, loving, and when played by the incomparable Alan Rickman, swoon worthy! With its 80% SW Merino and 10% Nylon this yarn is sturdy enough to last for years! The 10% Cashmere gives it a dreamy softness that will quickly become your go to yarn for socks, shawls, and any pattern worn next to your skin.

80% SW Merino 10% Cashmere 10% Nylon
231 yds/211 meters
4.5 sts sts per inch US 6/7

name: Penny - Laceweight
description: Penny is a beautiful lace weight with a dreamy mixture of 80% merino & and a soft and strong 20% silk. Like our girl Penny it's beautiful to look at but strong enough to hold even the most evil of villains. Dr. Horrible we're looking YOUR way. You'll love the way it makes your lace shine, like wonderflonium inthe dark!

name: Colonel Brandon - Sock
description:
Colonel Brandon is a yarn just as soulful as the character in Sense & Sensibility! Steadfast, loving, and when played by the incomparable Alan Rickman, swoon worthy! With its 80% SW Merino and 10% Nylon this yarn is sturdy enough to last for years! 80% SW Merino 10% Cashmere 10% Nylon
435 yds/398m  
7/8 sts per inch on size US 1/2 needle
